price: 13.Maalinka loogu tuuri NaartaJahannama si daran oo xoog leh (waxaa lagu dhihi):
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
